content: Mobile Bay is seeing monitoring of “SAV,” submerged aquatic vegetation, in the estuary, the sixth largest in the country. (Chickasaw Creek, Mobile River, Spanish River, Polecat Bay, Chacaloochee Bay, Raft River, Tensaw River, Apalachee River, Blakeley River, Chuckfee Bay)__no.0165, 2018. #estuaries #estuarinehealth
